description: This is a FastAPI Python module that implements OAuth 2.0 login flow with Atlassian's APIs, including endpoints for initiating login, handling callbacks, and managing session in-memory. It includes URL validation, state management, token exchange, and redirection logic.

classes.name: SessionData
classes.description: Data class representing OAuth session information, including state, code verifier, and tokens.

methods.name: oauth_atlassian_login(request: Request, return_url: Optional[str] = None, scope: Optional[str] = None)
methods.description: Initiates OAuth login flow, generates PKCE and state, stores session data, and redirects to Atlassian authorize URL.

methods.name: oauth_atlassian_callback_alias(request: Request, code: Optional[str] = None, state: Optional[str] = None)
methods.description: Compatibility alias for OAuth callback, reusing the main callback handler.

methods.name: oauth_atlassian_callback(request: Request, code: Optional[str] = None, state: Optional[str] = None)
methods.description: Handles OAuth callback, validates state, exchanges code for tokens, and redirects back to original return URL.

ctags.name: oauth_atlassian_callback
ctags.pattern: /^async def oauth_atlassian_callback(request: Request, code: Optional[str] = None, state: Optional/
ctags.signature: (request: Request, code: Optional[str] = None, state: Optional[str] = None)

ctags.name: oauth_atlassian_callback_alias
ctags.pattern: /^async def oauth_atlassian_callback_alias(request: Request, code: Optional[str] = None, state: Op/
ctags.signature: (request: Request, code: Optional[str] = None, state: Optional[str] = None)

ctags.name: oauth_atlassian_login
ctags.pattern: /^async def oauth_atlassian_login(request: Request, return_url: Optional[str] = None, scope: Optio/
ctags.signature: (request: Request, return_url: Optional[str] = None, scope: Optional[str] = None)
